scripts.buildall: cd lambda-functions/get-job-postings && npm install && npm run build && cd ../job-posting-aggregator && npm install && npm run build && cd ../skill-extractor && npm install && npm run build && cd ../skill-extractor-ai && npm install && npm run build && cd ../skill-extractor-algo && npm install && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.packageall: node zip.js lambda-functions/get-job-postings && node zip.js lambda-functions/job-posting-aggregator && node zip.js lambda-functions/skill-extractor && node zip.js lambda-functions/skill-extractor-ai && node zip.js lambda-functions/skill-extractor-algo
